quote: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.
One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
How strange that nature does not knock, and yet does not intrude!
The sun, the earth, love, friends, our very breath are parts of the banquet.
Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
Science is magic that works.
Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
There's real poetry in the real world. Science is the poetry of reality.
Preserve and cherish the pale blue dot, the only home we've ever known.
Adopt the pace of nature. Her secret is patience.
The earth does not belong to us; we belong to the earth.
Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
Truly the schemes and wonders of Nature are illimitable.
In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
Where flowers bloom, so does hope.
Some old-fashioned things like fresh air and sunshine are hard to beat.
I firmly believe that nature brings solace in all troubles.
My wish is to stay always like this, living quietly in a corner of nature.
Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect.
If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
To the eyes of the man of imagination, nature is imagination itself.
Heaven is under our feet as well as over our heads.
There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
Sunsets are proof that endings can often be beautiful, too.
If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere.
The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
Always be on the lookout for the presence of wonder.
I wish the world was twice as big - and half of it was still unexplored.
The mountains are calling and I must go.
I believe a leaf of grass is no less than the journey-work of the stars.
During all these years there existed within me a tendency to follow Nature in her walks.
A change in the weather is sufficient to recreate the world and ourselves.
It never hurts to keep looking for sunshine.
To forget how to dig the earth and to tend the soil is to forget ourselves.
You can cut all the flowers, but you can't keep spring from coming.
The world is mud-luscious and puddle-wonderful.
In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt.
The creation of a thousand forests is in one acorn.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
Nature is pleased with simplicity.
If we save our wild places, we will ultimately save ourselves.
Storms make trees take deeper roots.
Walking is a man's best medicine.
Men Argue. Nature acts.
The highest reach of human science is the scientific recognition of human ignorance.
Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.
Science is not only a disciple of reason but, also, one of romance and passion.
Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
